clc-resource-group.body:
resource "clc_group" "$1" {
    # name - (Optional) (Required, string) The name (or GUID) of this server group. Will resolve to existing if present.
    name = ""

    # parent - (Optional) (Required, string) The name or ID of the parent group. Will error if absent or unable to resolve.
    parent = ""

    # location_id - (Optional) (Required, string) The datacenter location of both parent group and this group.
    location_id = ""

    # description - (Optional) (Optional, string) Description for server group (visible in control portal only)
    description = ""

    # custom_fields - (Optional) See [CustomFields](#custom_fields) below for details.
    custom_fields = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
clc-resource-group.description: Manages a CLC server group. Either provisions or resolves to an existing group. See also [Complete API documentation](https://www.ctl.io/api-docs/v2/#groups).

clc-resource-load-balancer.body:
resource "clc_load_balancer" "$1" {
    # name - (Optional) (Required, string) The name of the load balancer.
    name = ""

    # data_center - (Optional) (Required, string) The datacenter location of both parent group and this group.
    data_center = ""

    # status - (Optional) (Required, string) Either "enabled" or "disabled"
    status = ""

    # description - (Optional) (Optional, string) Description for server group (visible in control portal only)
    description = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
clc-resource-load-balancer.description: Manages a CLC load balancer. Manage connected backends with [clc_load_balancer_pool](load_balancer_pool.html) See also [Complete API documentation](https://www.ctl.io/api-docs/v2/#shared-load-balancer).

clc-resource-load-balancer-pool.body:
resource "clc_load_balancer_pool" "$1" {
    # load_balancer - (Optional) (Required, string) The id of the load balancer.
    load_balancer = ""

    # data_center - (Optional) (Required, string) The datacenter location for this pool.
    data_center = ""

    # port - (Optional) (Required, int) Either 80 or 443
    port = ""

    # method - (Optional) (Optional, string) The configured balancing method. Either
    method = ""

    # persistence - (Optional) (Optional, string) The configured persistence
    persistence = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
clc-resource-load-balancer-pool.description: Manages a CLC load balancer pool. Manage related frontend with [clc_load_balancer](load_balancer.html) See also [Complete API documentation](https://www.ctl.io/api-docs/v2/#shared-load-balancer).

clc-resource-public-ip.body:
resource "clc_public_ip" "$1" {
    # server_id - (Optional) (Required, string) The name or ID of the server to bind IP to.
    server_id = ""

    # internal_ip_address - (Optional) (Required, string) The internal IP of the
    internal_ip_address = ""

    # ports - (Optional) See [Ports](#ports) below for details.
    ports = ""

    # source_restrictions - (Optional) See
    source_restrictions = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
clc-resource-public-ip.description: Manages a CLC public ip (for an existing server). See also [Complete API documentation](https://www.ctl.io/api-docs/v2/#public-ip).

clc-resource-server.body:
resource "clc_server" "$1" {
    # name_template - (Optional) (Required, string) The basename of the server. A unique name will be generated by the platform.
    name_template = ""

    # source_server_id - (Optional) (Required, string) The name or ID of the base OS image.
    source_server_id = ""

    # group_id - (Optional) (Required, string) The name or ID of the server group to spawn server into.
    group_id = ""

    # cpu - (Optional) (Required, int) The number of virtual cores
    cpu = ""

    # memory_mb - (Optional) (Required, int) Provisioned RAM
    memory_mb = ""

    # type - (Optional) (Required, string) The virtualization type
    type = ""

    # password - (Optional) (Optional, string) The root/administrator password. Will be generated by platform if not provided.
    password = ""

    # description - (Optional) (Optional, string) Description for server (visible in control portal only)
    description = ""

    # power_state - (Optional) (Optional, string) See [PowerStates](#power_states) below for details.
    power_state = ""

    # private_ip_address - (Optional) (Optional, string) Set internal IP address. If absent, allocated and assigned from pool.
    private_ip_address = ""

    # network_id - (Optional) (Optional, string) GUID of network to use. (Must be set up in advance from control portal.)
    network_id = ""

    # storage_type - (Optional) (Optional, string) Backup and replication strategy for disks.
    storage_type = ""

    # aa_policy_id - (Optional) (Optional, string | hyperscale) Anti-Affinity policy ID
    aa_policy_id = ""

    # configuration_id - (Optional) (Optional, string | bareMetal) Hardware configuration ID
    configuration_id = ""

    # os_type - (Optional) (Optional, string | bareMetal) Operating system to install.
    os_type = ""

    # additional_disks - (Optional) See [Disks](#disks) below for details.
    additional_disks = ""

    # custom_fields - (Optional) See [CustomFields](#custom_fields) below for details.
    custom_fields = ""

    # metadata - (Optional) Misc state storage for non-CLC metadata.
    metadata = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
clc-resource-server.description: Manages a CLC server. Resources and Documentation: [Datacenter / Capability Map](https://www.ctl.io/data-centers/)  [Hyperscale](https://www.ctl.io/hyperscale/) and [Bare Metal](https://www.ctl.io/bare-metal/) Servers  [REST API](https://www.ctl.io/api-docs/v2/#servers-create-server)
